dt2.5:4.1: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:4.2: Te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:5.3: saṅkhārakkhandhena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:5.5: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:6.7: manindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:6.9: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:7.6: phoṭṭhabbadhātuyā ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:7.8: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:8.5: jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:8.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:9.3: nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:9.5: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:10.3: kāyindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:10.5: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:11.15: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:11.17: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:12.1: Saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:12.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:13.1: Viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:13.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:14.1: Nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:14.3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:15.5: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:15.7: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:16.4: iddhipādena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:16.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:17.5: maraṇena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:17.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:18.1: Paridevena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:18.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:19.18: manasikārena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:19.20: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:20.1: Cittena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:20.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:23.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:23.2: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:23.3: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …. #2
dt2.5:39.3: ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:39.5: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #21
dt2.5:40.2: anidassanasappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:40.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā. #22
dt2.5:43.2: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:43.3: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:43.5: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:44.3: sahetukehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:44.4: hetusampayuttehi ceva na ca hetūhi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:44.5: na hetusahetukehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:44.7: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:46.2: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:46.4: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:47.2: sappaṭighehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:47.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:48.1: Rūpīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:48.3: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:49.2: lokuttarehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:49.4: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:51.2: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:51.3: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:51.5: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:52.3: āsavasampayuttehi ceva no ca āsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:52.4: āsavavippayuttehi anāsavehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:52.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:54.7: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:54.9: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:55.4: sārammaṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:55.6: te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:56.9: upādādhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:56.11: te dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:57.1: Cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:57.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:58.6: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:58.8: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:59.1: Ajjhattikehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:59.3: te dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:61.3: kilesehi ceva saṃkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:61.4: kilesehi ceva saṃkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:61.5: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā … pe …
dt2.5:61.7: te dhammā dvīhi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
dt2.5:62.4: saṃkiliṭṭhehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:62.5: kilesasampayuttehi ceva no ca kilesehi dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.5:62.24: saraṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā?
dt2.5:62.25: Te dhammā ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
